name: Cringe And Unepic Adventure: A Strand Type Game
name_original: Cringe And Unepic Adventure: A Strand Type Game
description:
For GMTK Game Jam 2020. This is the first game jam I've participated in. This game is kind of a mess, but at least I made something and finished it.

In this game, you have to control 2 characters at once, only you control the left one by pushing buttons with the right one. If either get hit too many times, you lose. The goal is to reach the highest score possible.
